data_prep_plan.reason: To enable time-series analysis and proper date comparisons.

eda_plan.reason: To understand the overall distribution of content types (Movies vs. TV Shows) on the platform, which is a fundamental characteristic of the dataset.
To identify patterns in content addition over time, revealing growth trends or specific periods of increased content acquisition.
To determine the primary countries contributing content, highlighting key content markets or production hubs.
To identify the most popular genres and content ratings, providing insights into the platform's content focus and target audience.
To understand the typical duration characteristics for both movies and TV shows, revealing average movie lengths and TV show season counts.
